name: Gaur City
description: Gaur City offers excellent infrastructure, great internet connectivity, and a balanced lifestyle. Ideal for families and working professionals.

name: Jaypee Greens
description: Jaypee Greens is known for its premium living, golf course, greenery, and top-notch amenities. Great for those seeking luxury living.

name: ATS
description: ATS projects are renowned for quality construction, security, and peaceful surroundings. Popular among families.

name: Eldeco
description: Eldeco societies provide affordable housing options with good connectivity and basic amenities.

name: Saya
description: Saya offers well-designed apartments with modern facilities and good connectivity, making it ideal for professionals.
